SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CardValidation
The CardValidation class provides methods for validating credit card details.
DateValidation
The DateValidation class provides methods for validating dates.
DNIValidation
The DNIValidation class provides methods for validating Spanish DNI (Documento Nacional de Identidad).
EmailValidation
This class provides email validation functionality.
HourValidation
The HourValidation class provides methods for validating time components.
IPValidation
The IPValidator class provides methods to validate IP addresses both in string format and integer format.
LengthValidation
A utility class for length validation of strings, arrays, and lists.
PhoneValidation
The PhoneValidation class provides methods for validating phone numbers.
StringValidation
The StringValidation class provides methods to validate strings for various conditions such as being non-empty, having a valid length, being numeric, being alphanumeric, and being a valid URL.
ValidationException
The CardException class represents an exception related to credit card operations.
